participant_1.background:
I drive a hybrid car because I want to save the environment for my cats.
my wife and i enjoy long sunday drives.
i work from home.
I enjoy wearing my cat-eye glasses while training to compete in the Olympics.
I'd love to take my kids to the ballet in air conditioning.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy cooking elaborate meals on the weekends, especially during the holidays.
I spend time with my book club and read books I love.
I'm doing my best to maintain a healthy weight.
I met a group of amazing people from all over the world who shared my passion for adventure.
i like the color purple.

content.text: I am training to compete in the Olympics!
Oh my gosh, that is amazing! What event are you competing in?
I am in the running for the 100m dash!
Wow! I am so impressed! That is so exciting!
Thank you! I am very excited as well!
What is your favorite thing about training?
I love the feeling of pushing myself to my limits and seeing how far I can go.
That is a great mentality! I am sure you will do great!
Thanks so much! I appreciate the support!
Of course! What do you do for fun outside of training?
I love spending time with my wife and our cats. We go on long walks in the park on the weekends and I love taking them to the ballet.
That sounds so sweet! I love hearing about people's pets. I have two cats of my own and they are my best friends.
I am sure you are an amazing parent to them!
Thank you! I try my best!
It sounds like you have a lot of amazing things going on in your life!
I do! I am very grateful for all of the opportunities that I have been given.
I am sure that you are going to do great things in the future!
